title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: two-panel huipil; ground is a pattern of thin brown and orange stripes alternating with wider red stripes. Zigzag patterns and geometric motifs arranged in rows across the width of the huipil, in  magenta, acqua, blue, purple, white, and yellow. Round neck lined with pink ribbon.
creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard L. Simmons
